classes.name: .font-sans
classes.property: font-family: system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, Fira Sans, Droid Sans, Helvetica Neue, sans-serif;

classes.name: .font-serif
classes.property: font-family: Constantia, Lucida Bright, Lucidabright, Lucida Serif, Lucida, DejaVu Serif, Bitstream Vera Serif, Liberation Serif, Georgia, serif;

classes.name: .font-mono
classes.property: font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, Liberation Mono, Courier New, monospace;
